subject: Olympic Games (2006)
Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Speedskater Joey Cheek, who donated $40,000 in gold- and silver-medal bonuses to a humanitarian organization, received a prominent mention in President Bush's speech welcoming the Olympians.
snippet: Speedskater Joey Cheek, who donated $40,000 in gold- and silver-medal bonuses to a humanitarian organization, received a prominent mention in President Bush's speech welcoming the Olympians.
